André Heuzé https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Andr%C3%A9_Heuz%C3%A9 0 André Heuzé, or sometimes André Heuse, (Paris 5 December 1880 –16 August 1942) was a French movie director, screenwriter and playwright. André_Heuzé , or sometimes André_Heuse , ( Paris_5_December_1880 – 16_August_1942 ) was a_French_movie_director , screenwriter_and_playwright .
